values: I am posting this to Dreamwidth and echoing it to LJ because neither of us can comment on Blaise's LJ post. We both get errors. Congratulations, LJ, you broke the system. Happy now?? Stop trying to be just like the Faceborg and Galling+!! Anyway, update: Blaise no longer knows how long it will take to get the server up again. What should have taken the hosting company no more than 4 hours has now taken 3 days and counting. Once the system is stable, it shouldn't take Blaise more than 8 hours to restore configurations and data. He's hoping by noon tomorrow, but, of course, can't guarantee that. He apologizes for the inconvenience. Feel free to pass this on to anyone else who might not see it elsewhere. This entry was originally posted at http://nostasia.dreamwidth.org/11229.html.

This is mostly a Friends-only journal. If you wish to Friend me, you need to let me know who you are. If you do not and I think you are a spammer, I will ban you.

Comments screened.

Posted via LiveJournal app for iPhone.

Originally posted by at Spirit Day
 


It’s been decided. On October 20th, 2010, we will wear purple in honor of the 6 gay boys who committed suicide in recent weeks/months due to homophobic abuse in their homes at at their schools. Purple represents Spirit on the LGBTQ flag and that’s exactly what we’d like all of you to have with you: spirit. Please know that times will get better and that you will meet people who will love you and respect you for who you are, no matter your sexuality. Please wear purple on October 20th. Tell your friends, family, co-workers, neighbors and schools.

RIP Tyler Clementi, Seth Walsh (top)
RIP Justin Aaberg, Raymond Chase (middle)
RIP Asher Brown and Billy Lucas. (bottom)

REBLOG to spread a message of love, unity and peace.
